page.title: 08CHURCHES IN S. PEVERELL
page.content: {METHODIST CHURCH The Methodist Church was built in 1803 ,it's now 182 years old. At the front is a school room and at the back is another school room,we use the back room as a youth club which takes place on Friday evenings.Recently they have added a kitchen and a toilet.The back room is also used as Sunday School which is run by Alan Perkins and Peter Goffin.The Minister is the Rev.Deveraj and a service is held every Sunday. {C OF E CHURCH This Church was built in the 12th Century and an addition was made by the Lady Margaret Beaufort later in the 15th Century, the addition was a south ailse and a porch. Recently our Vicar has been made a Rector of the five parishes in the area:Sampford Peverell,Uplowman,Burlescombe etc.
